app_descript:
App Name: Hype Simulator

Brief: Hype Simulator is an innovative parody app designed to simulate the experience of digital fame by imitating social media interactions in a controlled environment. The app emphasizes educational purposes, aiming to help users understand that true value lies not in the quantity of likes but in the quality of content and engagement with others.
